entry.title: Sure Flo - 6'' Foot Valve Vertical Female Thread SFVV6-FP
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sure Flo
Type: Foot Valves
Price: 542.80

Vertical Threaded Female NPT

 

  • This foot valve attaches to a standard NPT (national pipe thread) threaded male end; on Hose, PVC, HDPE, or steel pipe
  • Thick cast aluminum is light, strong, and durable
  • Many screen options for your pumping application. Standard aluminum ¼ hole screen
  • Efficient flapper style valve with very low friction loss
  • Zinc coated steel fasteners, or available Stainless Steel fasteners

 

 

Vertical Threaded Female NPT Foot Valve

entry.title: Sure Flo - 8'' Foot Valve 45 Degree OD Tubing SFV8
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sure Flo
Type: Foot Valves
Price: 573.40

45 Degree - Compression for OD Tubing

  • This valve attaches by compressing a ring gasket against OD tubing.

  • Thick cast aluminum is light, strong and durable.

  • Many screen options for your pumping application. Standard Aluminum ¼ hole screen.

  • Efficient flapper-style valve with very low friction loss.

  • Zinc coated steel fasteners, or available stainless steel fasteners.

entry.title: Sure Flo - 6'' Foot Valve 45 Degree Companion Flange SFV6-CF
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sure Flo
Type: Foot Valves
Price: 536.16

45 Degree - Companion Flange

 

  • This foot valve attaches to the bolt pattern of a standard 125-pound cast iron companion flange or a schedule 80 PVC flange.
  • Thick cast aluminum is light, strong and durable.
  • Many screen options for your pumping application. Standard Aluminum ¼ hole screen.
  • Efficient flapper-style valve with very low friction loss.
  • Zinc coated steel fasteners, or available stainless steel fasteners.
